QuestData.Title: WANTED: Gler'thogg
QuestData.Description:
Gler'thogg is responsible for the death and torture of many of the Unshackled.
They have shared with us their pain. Bring back his eye.
He dwells in the Deepcoil Tunnels. Extreme caution advised!
Upon completion of the mission, report to Seacaller Unow for commendation.
